fields.description: The client ID associated with the Salesforce Marketing Cloud application. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ClientId

fields.description: Properties used to connect to Salesforce Marketing Cloud. It is mutually exclusive with any other properties in the linked service. Type: object.
fields.name: ConnectionProperties

fields.description: The encrypted credential used for authentication. Credentials are encrypted using the integration runtime credential manager. Type: string.
fields.name: EncryptedCredential

fields.description: Specifies whether the data source endpoints are encrypted using HTTPS. The default value is true. Type: boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: UseEncryptedEndpoints

fields.description: Specifies whether to require the host name in the server's certificate to match the host name of the server when connecting over SSL. The default value is true. Type: boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: UseHostVerification

fields.description: Specifies whether to verify the identity of the server when connecting over SSL. The default value is true. Type: boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: UsePeerVerification
